sponsors.name: Z by HP
sponsors.intro: HP Inc. creates technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. Through our portfolio of printers, PCs, 3D Printing Technologies, mobile devices, solutions, and services, we engineer experiences that amaze and enable workflows that are seamless. Z by HP workstation solutions powered by NVIDIA RTX are designed to empower creators and power users around the world, from artists, to engineers and data scientists and more. More information about Z by HP is available at www.hp.com/z

sponsors.name: Unity
sponsors.intro: ### From independent boutiques to global media producers, immersive agencies and location-based creators – studios around the world are harnessing the power of real-time 3D technology to speed up production, smooth workflow hurdles, and grow their creativity with Unity.

sponsors.name: CoreSite Realty Corporation
sponsors.intro: CoreSite Realty Corporation (NYSE:COR) delivers secure, reliable, high-performance data center, cloud access and interconnection solutions to a growing customer ecosystem across eight key North American markets. More than 1,375 of the world’s leading enterprises, network operators, cloud providers, and supporting service providers choose CoreSite to connect, protect and optimize their performance-sensitive data, applications and computing workloads. Our scalable, flexible solutions and 460+ dedicated employees consistently deliver unmatched data center options — all of which leads to a best-in-class customer experience and lasting relationships.
sponsors.title: CoreSite Realty Corporation

sponsors.marquee: Empowering your future of creativity, content, and experiences.
sponsors.name: Microsoft
sponsors.intro: Microsoft empowers media & entertainment organizations to achieve more through a trusted and secure platform supported by a comprehensive partner ecosystem with industry-leading solutions for content production, collaboration, content delivery, audience insights, and personalized experiences.
sponsors.title: Microsoft

sponsors.name: Phase Two
sponsors.intro: Phase Two in Culver City, CA is a flexible workspace curated around talented entrepreneurs and businesses working in technology, media and entertainment. We help people and businesses reach their next phase of growth by providing creative office solutions, personalized hospitality, and business support.
sponsors.title: Phase Two

slides.name: Phase Two: Flexible Space Solutions for the Future

sponsors.marquee: Creating a World of Immersive Entertainment Without Limits…and with Petabytes of Data
sponsors.name: Intel
sponsors.intro:
# Intel

**Our Purpose**

We create world-changing technology that enriches the lives of every person on earth.

**We are inspired to:**

* Drive innovation that makes the world safer, builds healthy and vibrant communities, and increases productivity.
* Harness our reach around the globe to better society, business, and the planet.
* Push ourselves and our industry peers to be more responsible, inclusive, and sustainable.
* We have big ambitions, and a growing sense of urgency to work with others and address world challenges no one can tackle alone.

**Vision**

To be the trusted performance leader that unleashes the potential of data.

**Mission**

We engineer solutions for our customers’ greatest challenges with reliable, cloud to edge computing, inspired by Moore’s Law.

sponsors.marquee: We leverage the power of technology, location, and creativity to make meaningful connections between brands and audiences.
sponsors.name: OUTFRONT
sponsors.intro: OUTFRONT is embedded into the fabric of our cities and communities and trusted by the millions who engage with our media every day. We provide an integrated and targeted platform to connect brands to their desired audiences, as they live their lives through one of the largest and most diverse sets of billboard, transit, and mobile assets in North America. We are famous for incomparable impact and creativity of our medium, which drives engagement, fame, and trust. Our technology platform is fundamentally changing the ways advertisers engage audiences on-the-go.
sponsors.title: OUTFRONT - Presenting Media Partner of Infinity Festival 2021

sponsors.name: ART+TECH
sponsors.intro:
Art is made possible through technology. From the invention of the paintbrush to computer-programmed augmented reality, artists have always used technology to translate a creative thought into a physical work of art. The ART+TECH space at Infinity Festival showcases the incredible resources, advanced technology and incredible imagination of today’s cutting-edge artists.

ART+TECH includes internationally known artists working in mediums ranging from traditional video to advanced modern techniques including AR, AI and VR – all redefining the unlimited vision of the creative world. Infinity Festival supports the art community in all its forms. For additional information on our featured artists, please reference the list on the right side of this page.
sponsors.title: ART+TECH
